page.title: 10CRUCKMEOLE FARM LIVESTOCK
page.content:
The{livestock}consists of 55 Dairy cows, 20 Heifers, 20 Bullocks and 4 Sows for pork.
{Milking}is done all year round but each cow is dry for 2 months. The times of milking are 6.30am-9.00am and 4.30pm-6.30pm. The average milk yield per cow per day is 28 litres.On the day of our visit the total milk yield was 739 litres but it can be as high as 1000 litres. More milk is produced in Winter than in Summer. The farm was 12% over its milk quota in 1984.
The milk is collected daily by{Hanwood {Dairy.
{Calving is from July until December with 15-20 calves sold and the rest retained.
